entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Local ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
